import React, {useState } from "react"; import styles from './UseForm.module.css'; const UserForm = (props) => { const [error, setError] = useState(false); const [nameInput, setNameInput] = useState(''); const [isNameOnBlur, setIsNameOnBlur] = useState(false); const nameInputHandler = (event) => { setNameInput(event.target.value); } const nameBlurHandler = () => { } return
